title: One Piece: Why Doriki was an unreliable power level system, explained
author: XemPlus News
description: An analytical article examining why the doriki power measurement system introduced in Episode 266 was flawed and unreliable. Discusses how doriki only measures physical power without accounting for Devil Fruits or weapons, making it an incomplete power scaling system.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains analysis of Enies Lobby arc battles and power comparisons

title: Two Piece Podcast: One Piece: Water 7/Enies Lobby Arc Review
author: Travis and Ant (Two Piece Podcast)
description: Comprehensive review of the Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs, discussing the CP9 power reveals, the doriki system, and the major battles. Covers episodes 229-312 including Episode 266's introduction of the doriki measurement system.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full arc review with spoilers for entire Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs

title: Enies Lobby Arc - One Piece Manga Bros Podcast (Featuring Merphy Napier)
author: RuffSenpai, BoomSentai, SeeOhKnee, Merphy Napier
description: In-depth discussion of the Enies Lobby arc covering manga chapters 375-430. Features analysis of the CP9 power reveals including the doriki system, Rob Lucci's 4000 doriki reveal, and the implications for the upcoming battles.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full Enies Lobby arc discussion with spoilers

title: LUFFY VS 10,000 MARINES!! One Piece Episode 266 & 267 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Reactor Channel
description: First-time reaction and review to One Piece Episodes 266 and 267, featuring the CP9 doriki reveals and the beginning of the Enies Lobby assault.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Episode-specific reaction, no spoilers beyond episode 267

title: Enies Lobby Arc Review
author: One Piece Bazaar
description: Comprehensive review of the Enies Lobby arc, analyzing the CP9 power system introduction, the doriki measurements, and how they set up the subsequent battles. Discusses Episode 266's role in establishing the power hierarchy.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full arc review with spoilers for entire Enies Lobby arc

title: One Piece: How Strong is Rob Lucci?
author: Game Rant
description: Analysis article examining Rob Lucci's strength, starting from his 4000 doriki reveal in Episode 266 and analyzing how his power has evolved throughout the series.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for Rob Lucci's appearances throughout the entire series including recent arcs
